verses.verse: וַיְהִ֥י <S%H1961><s%> came דְבַר־ <S%H1697><s%> And the word יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD אֵלַ֥י <S%H413><s%> to me לֵאמֹֽר׃ <S%H559><s%> came unto me saying

בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> Son אָדָ֗ם <S%H120><s%> of man שִׂ֤ים <S%H7760><s%> set פָּנֶ֙יךָ֙ <S%H6440><s%> thy face אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> toward גּוֹג֙ <S%H1463><s%> against Gog אֶ֣רֶץ <S%H776><s%> the land הַמָּג֔וֹג <S%H4031><s%> of Magog נְשִׂ֕יא <S%H5387><s%> prince רֹ֖אשׁ <S%H7218><s%> the chief מֶ֣שֶׁךְ <S%H4902><s%> of Meshech וְתֻבָ֑ל <S%H8422><s%> and Tubal וְהִנָּבֵ֖א <S%H5012><s%> and prophesy עָלָֽיו׃ <S%H5921><s%> against

וְאָ֣מַרְתָּ֔ <S%H559><s%> And say כֹּ֥ה <S%H3541><s%> Thus אָמַ֖ר <S%H559><s%> Thus saith אֲדֹנָ֣י <S%H136><s%> the Lord יְהוִ֑ה <S%H3069><s%> GOD הִנְנִ֤י <S%H2005><s%> behold אֵלֶ֙יךָ֙ <S%H413><s%> I am against גּ֔וֹג <S%H1463><s%> Behold I [am] against thee O Gog נְשִׂ֕יא <S%H5387><s%> prince רֹ֖אשׁ <S%H7218><s%> the chief מֶ֥שֶׁךְ <S%H4902><s%> of Meshech וְתֻבָֽל׃ <S%H8422><s%> and Tubal

וְשׁ֣וֹבַבְתִּ֔יךָ <S%H7725><s%> And I will turn thee back וְנָתַתִּ֥י <S%H5414><s%> and put חַחִ֖ים <S%H2397><s%> hooks בִּלְחָיֶ֑יךָ <S%H3895><s%> into thy jaws וְהוֹצֵאתִי֩ <S%H3318><s%> and I will bring thee forth אוֹתְךָ֨ <S%H853><s%> וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> and all חֵילֶ֜ךָ <S%H2428><s%> and all thine army סוּסִ֣ים <S%H5483><s%> horses וּפָרָשִׁ֗ים <S%H6571><s%> and horsemen לְבֻשֵׁ֤י <S%H3847><s%> all of them clothed מִכְלוֹל֙ <S%H4358><s%> with all sorts כֻּלָּ֔ם <S%H3605><s%> all קָהָ֥ל <S%H6951><s%> company רָב֙ <S%H7227><s%> [of armour even] a great צִנָּ֣ה <S%H6793><s%> [with] bucklers וּמָגֵ֔ן <S%H4043><s%> and shields תֹּפְשֵׂ֥י <S%H8610><s%> all of them handling חֲרָב֖וֹת <S%H2719><s%> swords כֻּלָּֽם׃ <S%H3605><s%> all

פָּרַ֛ס <S%H6539><s%> Persia כּ֥וּשׁ <S%H3568><s%> Ethiopia וּפ֖וּט <S%H6316><s%> and Libya אִתָּ֑ם <S%H854><s%> for כֻּלָּ֖ם <S%H3605><s%> all מָגֵ֥ן <S%H4043><s%> with them all of them with shield וְכוֹבָֽע׃ <S%H3553><s%> and helmet

גֹּ֚מֶר <S%H1586><s%> Gomer וְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> all אֲגַפֶּ֔יהָ <S%H102><s%> and all his bands בֵּ֚ית <S%H1004><s%> the house תּֽוֹגַרְמָ֔ה <S%H8425><s%> of Togarmah יַרְכְּתֵ֥י <S%H3411><s%> quarters צָפ֖וֹן <S%H6828><s%> of the north וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all אֲגַפָּ֑יו <S%H102><s%> and all his bands עַמִּ֥ים <S%H5971><s%> people רַבִּ֖ים <S%H7227><s%> [and] many אִתָּֽךְ׃ <S%H854><s%> for

הִכֹּן֙ <S%H3559><s%> Be thou prepared וְהָכֵ֣ן <S%H3559><s%> and prepare לְךָ֔ אַתָּ֕ה <S%H859><s%> you וְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> and all קְהָלֶ֖ךָ <S%H6951><s%> for thyself thou and all thy company הַנִּקְהָלִ֣ים <S%H6950><s%> that are assembled עָלֶ֑יךָ <S%H5921><s%> about וְהָיִ֥יתָ <S%H1961><s%> become לָהֶ֖ם לְמִשְׁמָֽר׃ <S%H4929><s%> unto thee and be thou a guard

מִיָּמִ֣ים <S%H3117><s%> days רַבִּים֮ <S%H7227><s%> After many תִּפָּקֵד֒ <S%H6485><s%> thou shalt be visited בְּאַחֲרִ֨ית <S%H319><s%> in the latter הַשָּׁנִ֜ים <S%H8141><s%> years תָּב֣וֹא ׀ <S%H935><s%> thou shalt come אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> into אֶ֣רֶץ ׀ <S%H776><s%> into the land מְשׁוֹבֶ֣בֶת <S%H7725><s%> [that is] brought back מֵחֶ֗רֶב <S%H2719><s%> from the sword מְקֻבֶּ֙צֶת֙ <S%H6908><s%> [and is] gathered מֵעַמִּ֣ים <S%H5971><s%> people רַבִּ֔ים <S%H7227><s%> out of many עַ֚ל <S%H5921><s%> unto הָרֵ֣י <S%H2022><s%> against the mountains יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> which הָי֥וּ <S%H1961><s%> had been לְחָרְבָּ֖ה <S%H2723><s%> waste תָּמִ֑יד <S%H8548><s%> which have been always וְהִיא֙ <S%H1931><s%> he מֵעַמִּ֣ים <S%H5971><s%> out of the nations הוּצָ֔אָה <S%H3318><s%> but it is brought forth וְיָשְׁב֥וּ <S%H3427><s%> and they shall dwell לָבֶ֖טַח <S%H983><s%> safely כֻּלָּֽם׃ <S%H3605><s%> all

וְעָלִ֙יתָ֙ <S%H5927><s%> Thou shalt ascend כַּשֹּׁאָ֣ה <S%H7722><s%> like a storm תָב֔וֹא <S%H935><s%> and come כֶּעָנָ֛ן <S%H6051><s%> thou shalt be like a cloud לְכַסּ֥וֹת <S%H3680><s%> to cover הָאָ֖רֶץ <S%H776><s%> the land תִּֽהְיֶ֑ה <S%H1961><s%> become אַתָּה֙ <S%H859><s%> you וְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> and all אֲגַפֶּ֔יךָ <S%H102><s%> thou and all thy bands וְעַמִּ֥ים <S%H5971><s%> people רַבִּ֖ים <S%H7227><s%> and many אוֹתָֽךְ׃ <S%H854><s%> for ס

כֹּ֥ה <S%H3541><s%> Thus אָמַ֖ר <S%H559><s%> Thus saith אֲדֹנָ֣י <S%H136><s%> the Lord יְהוִ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> GOD וְהָיָ֣ה ׀ <S%H1961><s%> will come בַּיּ֣וֹם <S%H3117><s%> It shall also come to pass [that] at the same time הַה֗וּא <S%H1931><s%> he יַעֲל֤וּ <S%H5927><s%> come דְבָרִים֙ <S%H1697><s%> shall things עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> into לְבָבֶ֔ךָ <S%H3824><s%> into thy mind וְחָשַׁבְתָּ֖ <S%H2803><s%> and thou shalt think מַחֲשֶׁ֥בֶת <S%H4284><s%> thought רָעָֽה׃ <S%H7451><s%> an evil

וְאָמַרְתָּ֗ <S%H559><s%> And thou shalt say אֶֽעֱלֶה֙ <S%H5927><s%> I will go up עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> against אֶ֣רֶץ <S%H776><s%> to the land פְּרָז֔וֹת <S%H6519><s%> of unwalled villages אָבוֹא֙ <S%H935><s%> I will go הַשֹּׁ֣קְטִ֔ים <S%H8252><s%> to them that are at rest יֹשְׁבֵ֖י <S%H3427><s%> that dwell לָבֶ֑טַח <S%H983><s%> safely כֻּלָּ֗ם <S%H3605><s%> all יֹֽשְׁבִים֙ <S%H3427><s%> all of them dwelling בְּאֵ֣ין <S%H369><s%> without חוֹמָ֔ה <S%H2346><s%> without walls וּבְרִ֥יחַ <S%H1280><s%> and having neither bars וּדְלָתַ֖יִם <S%H1817><s%> nor gates אֵ֥ין <S%H369><s%> and having לָהֶֽם׃

לִשְׁלֹ֥ל <S%H7997><s%> To take שָׁלָ֖ל <S%H7998><s%> a spoil וְלָבֹ֣ז <S%H962><s%> and to take בַּ֑ז <S%H957><s%> a prey לְהָשִׁ֨יב <S%H7725><s%> to turn יָדְךָ֜ <S%H3027><s%> thine hand עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> against חֳרָב֣וֹת <S%H2723><s%> upon the desolate places נוֹשָׁבֹ֗ת <S%H3427><s%> [that are now] inhabited וְאֶל־ <S%H413><s%> and against עַם֙ <S%H5971><s%> and upon the people מְאֻסָּ֣ף <S%H622><s%> [that are] gathered מִגּוֹיִ֔ם <S%H1471><s%> out of the nations עֹשֶׂה֙ <S%H6213><s%> which have gotten מִקְנֶ֣ה <S%H4735><s%> cattle וְקִנְיָ֔ן <S%H7075><s%> and goods יֹשְׁבֵ֖י <S%H3427><s%> that dwell עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> against טַבּ֥וּר <S%H2872><s%> in the midst הָאָֽרֶץ׃ <S%H776><s%> of the land

שְׁבָ֡א <S%H7614><s%> Sheba וּ֠דְדָן <S%H1719><s%> and Dedan וְסֹחֲרֵ֨י <S%H5503><s%> and the merchants תַרְשִׁ֤ישׁ <S%H8659><s%> of Tarshish וְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> all כְּפִרֶ֙יהָ֙ <S%H3715><s%> with all the young lions יֹאמְר֣וּ <S%H559><s%> thereof shall say לְךָ֔ הֲלִשְׁלֹ֤ל <S%H7997><s%> to take שָׁלָל֙ <S%H7998><s%> prey אַתָּ֣ה <S%H859><s%> have you בָ֔א <S%H935><s%> unto thee Art thou come הֲלָבֹ֥ז <S%H962><s%> to take בַּ֖ז <S%H957><s%> plunder הִקְהַ֣לְתָּ <S%H6950><s%> assemble קְהָלֶ֑ךָ <S%H6951><s%> thy company לָשֵׂ֣את ׀ <S%H5375><s%> to carry כֶּ֣סֶף <S%H3701><s%> silver וְזָהָ֗ב <S%H2091><s%> and gold לָקַ֙חַת֙ <S%H3947><s%> to take away מִקְנֶ֣ה <S%H4735><s%> cattle וְקִנְיָ֔ן <S%H7075><s%> and goods לִשְׁלֹ֖ל <S%H7997><s%> to take שָׁלָ֥ל <S%H7998><s%> prey גָּדֽוֹל׃ <S%H1419><s%> a great ס

לָכֵן֙ <S%H3651><s%> Therefore הִנָּבֵ֣א <S%H5012><s%> prophesy בֶן־ <S%H1121><s%> Therefore son אָדָ֔ם <S%H120><s%> of man וְאָמַרְתָּ֣ <S%H559><s%> and say לְג֔וֹג <S%H1463><s%> unto Gog כֹּ֥ה <S%H3541><s%> Thus אָמַ֖ר <S%H559><s%> Thus saith אֲדֹנָ֣י <S%H136><s%> the Lord יְהוִ֑ה <S%H3069><s%> GOD הֲל֣וֹא ׀ <S%H3808><s%> not בַּיּ֣וֹם <S%H3117><s%> In that day הַה֗וּא <S%H1931><s%> he בְּשֶׁ֨בֶת <S%H3427><s%> dwelleth עַמִּ֧י <S%H5971><s%> when my people יִשְׂרָאֵ֛ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel לָבֶ֖טַח <S%H983><s%> safely תֵּדָֽע׃ <S%H3045><s%> shalt thou not know

וּבָ֤אתָ <S%H935><s%> And thou shalt come מִמְּקֽוֹמְךָ֙ <S%H4725><s%> from thy place מִיַּרְכְּתֵ֣י <S%H3411><s%> parts צָפ֔וֹן <S%H6828><s%> out of the north אַתָּ֕ה <S%H859><s%> you וְעַמִּ֥ים <S%H5971><s%> people רַבִּ֖ים <S%H7227><s%> thou and many אִתָּ֑ךְ <S%H854><s%> for רֹכְבֵ֤י <S%H7392><s%> with thee all of them riding סוּסִים֙ <S%H5483><s%> upon horses כֻּלָּ֔ם <S%H3605><s%> all קָהָ֥ל <S%H6951><s%> company גָּד֖וֹל <S%H1419><s%> a great וְחַ֥יִל <S%H2428><s%> army רָֽב׃ <S%H7227><s%> and a mighty

וְעָלִ֙יתָ֙ <S%H5927><s%> And thou shalt come up עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> against עַמִּ֣י <S%H5971><s%> against my people יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel כֶּֽעָנָ֖ן <S%H6051><s%> as a cloud לְכַסּ֣וֹת <S%H3680><s%> to cover הָאָ֑רֶץ <S%H776><s%> the land בְּאַחֲרִ֨ית <S%H319><s%> it shall be in the latter הַיָּמִ֜ים <S%H3117><s%> days תִּֽהְיֶ֗ה <S%H1961><s%> shall come וַהֲבִאוֹתִ֙יךָ֙ <S%H935><s%> and I will bring עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> against אַרְצִ֔י <S%H776><s%> thee against my land לְמַעַן֩ <S%H4616><s%> so דַּ֨עַת <S%H3045><s%> may know הַגּוֹיִ֜ם <S%H1471><s%> that the heathen אֹתִ֗י <S%H853><s%> בְּהִקָּדְשִׁ֥י <S%H6942><s%> me when I shall be sanctified בְךָ֛ לְעֵינֵיהֶ֖ם <S%H5869><s%> before their eyes גּֽוֹג׃ <S%H1463><s%> in thee O Gog ס

כֹּֽה־ <S%H3541><s%> Thus אָמַ֞ר <S%H559><s%> Thus saith אֲדֹנָ֣י <S%H136><s%> the Lord יְהוִ֗ה <S%H3069><s%> GOD הַֽאַתָּה־ <S%H859><s%> are you ה֨וּא <S%H1931><s%> the one אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> of whom דִּבַּ֜רְתִּי <S%H1696><s%> [Art] thou he of whom I have spoken בְּיָמִ֣ים <S%H3117><s%> time קַדְמוֹנִ֗ים <S%H6931><s%> in old בְּיַד֙ <S%H3027><s%> by עֲבָדַי֙ <S%H5650><s%> my servants נְבִיאֵ֣י <S%H5030><s%> the prophets יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel הַֽנִּבְּאִ֛ים <S%H5012><s%> which prophesied בַּיָּמִ֥ים <S%H3117><s%> in those days הָהֵ֖ם <S%H1992><s%> those שָׁנִ֑ים <S%H8141><s%> [many] years לְהָבִ֥יא <S%H935><s%> that I would bring אֹתְךָ֖ <S%H853><s%> עֲלֵיהֶֽם׃ <S%H5921><s%> against ס

וְהָיָ֣ה ׀ <S%H1961><s%> will come בַּיּ֣וֹם <S%H3117><s%> And it shall come to pass at the same time הַה֗וּא <S%H1931><s%> he בְּי֨וֹם <S%H3117><s%> when בּ֥וֹא <S%H935><s%> shall come גוֹג֙ <S%H1463><s%> Gog עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> against אַדְמַ֣ת <S%H127><s%> against the land יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel נְאֻ֖ם <S%H5002><s%> saith אֲדֹנָ֣י <S%H136><s%> the Lord יְהוִ֑ה <S%H3069><s%> GOD תַּעֲלֶ֥ה <S%H5927><s%> shall come up חֲמָתִ֖י <S%H2534><s%> [that] my fury בְּאַפִּֽי׃ <S%H639><s%> in my face

וּבְקִנְאָתִ֥י <S%H7068><s%> For in my jealousy בְאֵשׁ־ <S%H784><s%> [and] in the fire עֶבְרָתִ֖י <S%H5678><s%> of my wrath דִּבַּ֑רְתִּי <S%H1696><s%> have I spoken אִם־ <S%H518><s%> lo לֹ֣א ׀ <S%H3808><s%> not בַּיּ֣וֹם <S%H3117><s%> Surely in that day הַה֗וּא <S%H1931><s%> he יִֽהְיֶה֙ <S%H1961><s%> become רַ֣עַשׁ <S%H7494><s%> shaking גָּד֔וֹל <S%H1419><s%> there shall be a great עַ֖ל <S%H5921><s%> in אַדְמַ֥ת <S%H127><s%> in the land יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <S%H3478><s%> of Israel

וְרָעֲשׁ֣וּ <S%H7493><s%> shall shake מִפָּנַ֡י <S%H6440><s%> that [are] upon the face דְּגֵ֣י <S%H1709><s%> So that the fishes הַיָּם֩ <S%H3220><s%> of the sea וְע֨וֹף <S%H5775><s%> and the fowls הַשָּׁמַ֜יִם <S%H8064><s%> of the heaven וְחַיַּ֣ת <S%H2416><s%> and the beasts הַשָּׂדֶ֗ה <S%H7704><s%> of the field וְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> all הָרֶ֙מֶשׂ֙ <S%H7431><s%> and all creeping things הָרֹמֵ֣שׂ <S%H7430><s%> that creep עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> on הָֽאֲדָמָ֔ה <S%H127><s%> upon the earth וְכֹל֙ <S%H3605><s%> and all הָֽאָדָ֔ם <S%H120><s%> and all the men אֲשֶׁ֖ר <S%H834><s%> who עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> at פְּנֵ֣י <S%H6440><s%> at my presence הָאֲדָמָ֑ה <S%H127><s%> of the earth וְנֶהֶרְס֣וּ <S%H2040><s%> shall be thrown down הֶהָרִ֗ים <S%H2022><s%> and the mountains וְנָֽפְלוּ֙ <S%H5307><s%> shall fall הַמַּדְרֵג֔וֹת <S%H4095><s%> and the steep places וְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> and every חוֹמָ֖ה <S%H2346><s%> and every wall לָאָ֥רֶץ <S%H776><s%> to the ground תִּפּֽוֹל׃ <S%H5307><s%> shall fall

וְקָרָ֨אתִי <S%H7121><s%> And I will call עָלָ֤יו <S%H5921><s%> against לְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> all הָרַי֙ <S%H2022><s%> against him throughout all my mountains חֶ֔רֶב <S%H2719><s%> for a sword נְאֻ֖ם <S%H5002><s%> saith אֲדֹנָ֣י <S%H136><s%> the Lord יְהוִ֑ה <S%H3069><s%> GOD חֶ֥רֶב <S%H2719><s%> sword אִ֖ישׁ <S%H376><s%> every man's בְּאָחִ֥יו <S%H251><s%> shall be against his brother תִּֽהְיֶֽה׃ <S%H1961><s%> become

וְנִשְׁפַּטְתִּ֥י <S%H8199><s%> And I will plead אִתּ֖וֹ <S%H853><s%> בְּדֶ֣בֶר <S%H1698><s%> against him with pestilence וּבְדָ֑ם <S%H1818><s%> and with blood וְגֶ֣שֶׁם <S%H1653><s%> rain שׁוֹטֵף֩ <S%H7857><s%> that [are] with him an overflowing וְאַבְנֵ֨י <S%H68><s%> stones אֶלְגָּבִ֜ישׁ <S%H417><s%> great hail אֵ֣שׁ <S%H784><s%> fire וְגָפְרִ֗ית <S%H1614><s%> and brimstone אַמְטִ֤יר <S%H4305><s%> and I will rain עָלָיו֙ <S%H5921><s%> and וְעַל־ <S%H5921><s%> on אֲגַפָּ֔יו <S%H102><s%> upon him and upon his bands וְעַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and עַמִּ֥ים <S%H5971><s%> people רַבִּ֖ים <S%H7227><s%> and upon the many אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> who אִתּֽוֹ׃ <S%H854><s%> for

וְהִתְגַּדִּלְתִּי֙ <S%H1431><s%> Thus will I magnify וְהִתְקַדִּשְׁתִּ֔י <S%H6942><s%> myself and sanctify וְנ֣וֹדַעְתִּ֔י <S%H3045><s%> myself and I will be known לְעֵינֵ֖י <S%H5869><s%> in the eyes גּוֹיִ֣ם <S%H1471><s%> nations רַבִּ֑ים <S%H7227><s%> of many וְיָדְע֖וּ <S%H3045><s%> and they shall know כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> that אֲנִ֥י <S%H589><s%> I am יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> that I [am] the LORD ס
